name: LD44-FooSHooter
description:
A game for the ludum dare 44 - theme: "Your Life Is Your Ressource";

The most basic of theme ideas: it’s a shooter, where you can exchange your lifepoints for ammo and weapons.

Controls: w,a,s,d # left mouse button : shoot # right mouse button : reload

Tools used: Unity 2019.1 | Blender 2.8 | Beepbox.co | sfxr
